attributes.action: go ahead with the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no magic formula to reducing road congestion other than to deter drivers (particularly 1 person drivers) from making unnecessary journeys and to make them aware that they are the cause of the problem. This small island is overrun with traffic and as has been proved in the past, building new roads quite often leads to congestion elsewhere. It is common place in Europe and London has proved to be successful. Time for drivers to be less selfish.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
